body.p: Hence, the 2018 Conceptual Framework describes measurement uncertainty as a factor that can affect whether it is possible to provide a faithful representation. In addition, the Board noted that addressing measurement uncertainty in the discussion of faithful representation is more consistent with a notion of a trade-off between the two fundamental qualitative characteristics—relevance and faithful representation (see paragraphs 2.22 and BC2.52–BC2.56).
